text: Stratford-upon-Avon is a town in England. It is famous as the birthplace of William Shakespeare. It lies on the River Avon, 22 miles (35 km) south east of Birmingham and 8 miles (13 km) south west of the county town, Warwick. Category:Towns in Warwickshire Category:Sites associated with William Shakespeare
title: Stratford-upon-Avon
